content.raw:
Where am I supposed to see the results of this?

1. Open the world with the plugin and click the spawn button, one camera comes up

1. Ctrl + T and choose to visualize the camera image, I can see the things I put in front of it

1. Select the camera, its name appears on the top of the GUI overlay

1. I change several values, including making the camera custom, increasing the FOV, scale/not scale... Nothing seems to change the image in the topic. Even if I reopen the topic window the image seems not to have changed.

Am I doing something wrong?
content.html:
Where am I supposed to see the results of this?

  1. Open the world with the plugin and click the spawn button, one camera comes up

  2. Ctrl + T and choose to visualize the camera image, I can see the things I put in front of it

  3. Select the camera, its name appears on the top of the GUI overlay

  4. I change several values, including making the camera custom, increasing the FOV, scale/not scale... Nothing seems to change the image in the topic. Even if I reopen the topic window the image seems not to have changed.

Am I doing something wrong?
